title: Debt and Defiance
description: Leanne struggles with a recent turn of events. She has resolve and determination, takes time to sojourn at an old farmhouse, for a personal mission to uncover her family roots. The vacation provides time for reflection, but the chain of discoveries is extraordinary and for some has proved fatal!Leanne’s recent life has been a stream of emotional events. She's alone, vulnerable, definitely resilient. Decisions must be made rapidly, as currently she has no job or prospects. She moves to her grandmother’s old home, and then the troubles emerge and multiply. Too many people hold grudges and secrets that inadvertently "blow up in their faces." The casualties may not be innocent!
author: Honor A. Dawson
